languageKey.label: Name of the locality
Any name variants of the locality
Geographical coordinates of the locality (decimal degrees)
Details of the locality
Any images of the locality
Each locality can have some keywords attributed
Each locality can carry date information
Each locality has relations to the sources in which it appears
